snippet: Off the Rails: When a shoe fell from a train platform onto a ledge over the tracks, a hero responded with the "claw.''
abstract: Off the Rails: When a shoe fell from a train platform onto a ledge over the tracks, a hero responded with the "claw.''
lead_paragraph: If a shoe falls on a subway track, and no one is around to retrieve it, does its owner make a sound?

headline.main: Prince Charming for a Shoeless Subway Cinderfella
